name: Unity NextBot-ness
description:
this is just a small game made for fun with the Unity Engine where you have to run away from the Nextbots that chase you throughout the maps for as long as you can featuring a simple AI made completely by me with the intent to feel as similar to the Gmod equivalent as possible

[FEATURES]
- 3 Nextbots with their own stats, pictures and themes
- 2 maps to choose from
- 2 modes: a quickplay mode that immediately puts you in one map with all 3 nextbots and a mode where you can select one bot and one map

[CONTROLS]
WASD: moving around
SPACE: jumping
